name: Holivine
overview:
About Online marketplace for electronic commerce allowing the growing and promising African consumer demographic to buy and sell securely. Mission Our mission is to pull down the barriers to ecommerce into and across the African continent be them financial, security, technical, psychological to empower people and brands to start selling over the internet.

As a team we’re passionate about technology and believe the internet is a force for good. Our desire is to harness this force to empower people, enrich their lives whilst doing good across Africa.

Company Overview Operated by Holivine

Description Holivine is an ecommerce platform offering the easiest and fastest tools to open ecommerce shops on the web securely without requiring any software or complex technical knowledge. Our platform has direct integration to the various leading local electronic payment processing systems available in Africa including internet and mobile payment gateways.

It is free quick and easy for anyone to set up a shop as a Seller, drive traffic and generate sales. For buyers, Holivine offers an integrated marketplace and networked checkout where discovering, browsing and purchasing products from sellers across the world is quick, easy and simple.

“The future growth of the world economy is reliant upon the development of Africa. Future growth in the world economy, and future jobs in the developing world, will depend on harnessing both the productive potential and the pent-up consumer demand of this continent”. ….Gordon Brown - Former Prime Minister of Great Britain.
